comments.html:
Playing with the poll results is very easy task. Simply discard cookies & change IP address (disconnect then reconnect).
No creativity required :)
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: Stuffing the ballot box is easy. Ensuring all four options have identical number of votes regardless of actual visitor voting requires creativity :)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: But the votes shown at close aren't perfectly spread...
comments.name: Anonymous
